attributes.action: Recommend to Her Majesty the honour of a Knighthood for Professor Colin Blakemore
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Consistently overlooked for a knighthood, Colin Blakemore is Professor of Neuroscience at Oxford University.  It is time to honour him for his life's work and to support science and research properly.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
